stimulusHtml: Two spheres of uniform density are located a distance L apart, as shown in the figure below. The left sphere has a mass M 1 , and the right sphere has a mass M 2 . The center of mass of the two spheres is labeled point P. Which of the following is a correct expression for the distance from point P to the center of the left sphere?
choicesHtml: M 1 M 2 L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E1F@

( M 1 + M 2 ) M 1 L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42C9@

( M 1 + M 2 ) M 2 L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42CA@

M 2 ( M 1 + M 2 ) L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42AB@

M 1 ( M 1 + M 2 ) L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42AA@
